alert.note: Alert for Durham; Granville; Person; Vance (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 2:16PM EDT until August 15 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Person County in central North Carolina... Western Vance County in central North Carolina... Central Granville County in central North Carolina... Northern Durham County in central North Carolina... * Until 300 PM EDT. * At 215 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Rougemont, or 10 miles southeast of Roxboro, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Oxford, Kittrell, Stem, Stovall, Dabney, Moriah, Berea, Lake Butner and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Raleigh.
